refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This object represents an Appstream software component which is associated to a package in the distribution's repositories. A component can be anything, ranging from an application to a font, a codec or even a non-visual software project providing libraries and python-modules for other applications to use.
The type of the component is stored as AsComponentKind and can be queried to find out which kind of component we're dealing with.

refsect2.title: as_component_kind_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Converts the enumerated value to an text representation.

refsect2.title: as_component_kind_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Converts the text representation to an enumerated value.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a AsComponentKind or AS_COMPONENT_KIND_UNKNOWN for unknown

refsect2.title: as_merge_kind_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Converts the enumerated value to an text representation.

refsect2.title: as_merge_kind_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Converts the text representation to an enumerated value.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a AsMergeKind or AS_MERGE_KIND_NONE for unknown

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The AsValueFlags that are set on cpt .

refsect2.title: as_component_get_active_locale ()
refsect2.para: Get the current active locale for this component, which is used to get localized messages.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_active_locale ()
refsect2.para: Set the current active locale for this component, which is used to get localized messages. If the AsComponent was fetched from a localized database, usually only one locale is available.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_id ()
refsect2.para: Get the unique AppStream identifier for this component. This ID is unique for the described component, but does not uniquely identify the metadata set.
For a unique ID for this metadata set in the current session, use as_component_get_data_id()

refsect2.title: as_component_set_id ()
refsect2.para: Set the AppStream identifier for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_data_id ()
refsect2.para: Get a unique identifier for this metadata set. This unique ID is only valid for the current session, as opposed to the AppStream ID which uniquely identifies a software component.
The format of the unique id usually is: %{scope}/%{origin}/%{distribution_system}/%{appstream_id}

refsect2.title: as_component_set_data_id ()
refsect2.para: Set the session-specific unique metadata identifier for this component. If two components have a different data_id but the same ID, they will be treated as independent sets of metadata describing the same component type.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_kind ()
refsect2.para: Returns the AsComponentKind of this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_kind ()
refsect2.para: Sets the AsComponentKind of this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_pkgname ()
refsect2.para: Get the first package name of the list of packages that need to be installed for this component to be present on the system. Since most components consist of only one package, this is safe to use for about 90% of all cases.

However, to support a component fully, please use as_component_get_pkgnames() for getting all packages that need to be installed, and use this method only to e.g. get the main package to perform a quick "is it installed?" check.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_pkgnames ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of package names which this component consists of. This usually is just one package name.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_pkgnames ()
refsect2.para: Set a list of package names this component consists of. (This should usually be just one package name)

refsect2.title: as_component_get_name ()
refsect2.para: A human-readable name for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_name ()
refsect2.para: Set a human-readable name for this component.

entry.para: The locale the used for this value, or NULL to use the current active one.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_summary ()
refsect2.para: Get a short description of this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_summary ()
refsect2.para: Set a short description for this component.

entry.para: The locale the used for this value, or NULL to use the current active one.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_description ()
refsect2.para: Get the localized long description of this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_description ()
refsect2.para: Set long description for this component.

entry.para: The locale the used for this value, or NULL to use the current active one.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_launchable ()
refsect2.para: Gets a AsLaunchable of a specific type that contains launchable entries for this component.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a AsLaunchable or NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_launchable ()
refsect2.para: Adds a AsLaunchable containing launchables entries for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_metadata_license ()
refsect2.para: The license the metadata iself is subjected to.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_metadata_license ()
refsect2.para: Set the license this metadata is licensed under.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_project_license ()
refsect2.para: Get the license of the project this component belongs to.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_developer_name ()
refsect2.para: Get the component's developer or development team name.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_developer_name ()
refsect2.para: Set the the component's developer or development team name.

entry.para: the developer or developer team name

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A list of desktops where this component is compulsory.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_compulsory_for_desktop ()
refsect2.para: Mark this component to be compulsory for the specified desktop environment.

refsect2.title: as_component_is_compulsory_for_desktop ()
refsect2.para: Check if this component is compulsory for the given desktop.

refsect2.title: as_component_has_category ()
refsect2.para: Check if component is in the specified category.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the component is in the specified category.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_screenshots ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of associated screenshots.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_screenshot ()
refsect2.para: Add an AsScreenshot to this component.

entry.para: Locale of the values, or NULL to use current locale.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GPtrArray of all icons for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_icon_by_size ()
refsect2.programlisting: AsIcon * as_component_get_icon_by_size (AsComponent *cpt, guint width, guint height);
refsect2.para: Gets an icon matching the size constraints. The icons are not filtered by type, and the first icon which matches the size is returned. If you want more control over which icons you use for displaying, use the as_component_get_icons() function to get a list of all icons.
Note that this function is not HiDPI aware! It will never return an icon with a scaling factor > 1.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: An icon matching the given width/height, or NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_icon ()
refsect2.para: Add an icon to this component.

entry.para: the valid AsIcon instance to add.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_provided ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of AsProvided objects associated with this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_provided ()
refsect2.para: Add a set of provided items to this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_provided_for_kind ()
refsect2.para: Get an AsProvided object for the given interface type, containing information about the public interfaces (mimetypes, firmware, DBus services, ...) this component provides.

entry.para: kind of the provided item, e.g. AS_PROVIDED_KIND_MIMETYPE

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: AsProvided containing the items this component provides, or NULL.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_url ()
refsect2.programlisting: void as_component_add_url (AsComponent *cpt, AsUrlKind url_kind, const gchar *url);
refsect2.para: Adds some URL data to the component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_releases ()
refsect2.para: Get an array of the AsRelease items this component provides.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_release ()
refsect2.para: Add an AsRelease to this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_extends ()
refsect2.para: Returns a string list of IDs of components which are extended by this addon.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GPtrArray or NULL if not set.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_extends ()
refsect2.para: Add a reference to the extended component

entry.para: The id of a component which is extended by this component

refsect2.title: as_component_get_addons ()
refsect2.para: Returns a list of AsComponent objects which are addons extending this component in functionality.
This is the reverse of as_component_get_extends()

refsect2.title: as_component_add_addon ()
refsect2.para: Add a reference to the addon that is enhancing this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_languages ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of all languages.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_language ()
refsect2.para: Gets the translation coverage in percent for a specific locale

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a percentage value, -1 if locale was not found

refsect2.title: as_component_add_language ()
refsect2.para: Adds a language to the component.

entry.para: the percentage completion of the translation, 0 for locales with unknown amount of translation

refsect2.title: as_component_get_translations ()
refsect2.para: Get a GPtrArray of AsTranslation objects describing the translation systems and translation-ids (e.g. Gettext domains) used by this software component.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_translation ()
refsect2.para: Assign an AsTranslation object describing the translation system used by this component.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if this component has a bundle associated.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_bundles ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of all software bundles associated with this component.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: An AsBundle, or NULL if not set.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_bundle ()
refsect2.para: Adds a bundle to the component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_suggested ()
refsect2.para: Get a list of associated suggestions.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_suggested ()
refsect2.para: Add an AsSuggested to this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_search_tokens ()
refsect2.para: Returns all search tokens for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_search_matches ()
refsect2.para: Searches component data for a specific keyword.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a match scrore, where 0 is no match and 100 is the best match.

refsect2.title: as_component_search_matches_all ()
refsect2.para: Searches component data for all the specific keywords.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a match score, where 0 is no match and larger numbers are better matches.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_merge_kind ()
refsect2.para: Get the merge method which should apply to duplicate components with this ID.

refsect2.title: as_component_set_merge_kind ()
refsect2.para: Sets the AsMergeKind for this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_is_member_of_category ()
refsect2.para: Test if the component cpt is a member of category category .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Whether this component's metadata should be ignored.

refsect2.title: as_component_is_valid ()
refsect2.para: Check if the essential properties of this Component are populated with useful data.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the component data was validated successfully.

refsect2.title: as_component_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Returns a string identifying this component. (useful for debugging)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Hash table of custom user defined data fields.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_custom_value ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve value for a custom data entry with the given key.

refsect2.title: as_component_insert_custom_value ()
refsect2.para: Add a key and value pair to the custom data table.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the key did not exist yet.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_content_ratings ()
refsect2.para: Gets all content ratings defined for this software.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_content_rating ()
refsect2.para: Gets a content ratings of a specific type that are defined for this component.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a AsContentRating or NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: as_component_add_content_rating ()
refsect2.para: Adds a content rating to this component.

refsect2.title: as_component_get_desktop_id ()

warning.para: as_component_get_desktop_id has been deprecated since version 0.11.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Get the Desktop Entry ID for this component, if it is of type "desktop-application". For most desktop-application components, this is the name of the .desktop file.

entry.para: A generic (= without specialized type) component
An extension of existing software, which does not run standalone

refsect2.title: enum AsMergeKind
refsect2.para: Defines how AsComponent data should be merged if the component is set for merge.

refsect2.title: enum AsComponentScope
refsect2.para: Scope of the AsComponent (system-wide or user-scope)

refsect2.title: enum AsValueFlags
refsect2.para: Set how values assigned to an AsComponent should be treated when they are set or retrieved.

entry.para: Check for duplicates when adding items to list values.
Don't fall back to C when retrieving translated values.

refsect2.title: The “icons” property
refsect2.para: hash map of icon urls and sizes
